page.title: 18FARMING
page.content: THE MOST RECENT ORDNANCE SURVEY MAPS WE COULD GET WERE DATED{1977 (EIGHT {YEARS OLD).}THESE MAPS SHOWED A GREAT NUMBER OF FARMS WITHIN OUR AREA.WE FOUND ONLY ONE FROM OUR LIST STILL EXISTED AS A WORKING FARM.MOST OF THE OTHERS HAD DISAPPEARED ALTOGETHER,THE LAND BEING USED FOR NEW {HOUSING}AND{LINK ROADS}IN THE{LOWER {EARLEY}AREA,AND THE NEW{INDUSTRY}IN THE{WINNERSH TRIANGLE}AREA.SOME SIGNS OF THE FARMS WERE LEFT.WE DID FIND {LODDON STUD FARM -}THIS WAS NOW A {BUILDERS YARD,}BUT THE STABLES WERE STILL STANDING.THERE IS OBVIOUSLY NO PLACE FOR{FARMING}IN THIS FAST DEVELOPING AREA.NEW{HOUSING}AND {INDUSTRIAL BUILDING}HAVE CHANGED THE {CHARACTER}COMPLETELY.THERE IS VERY LITTLE OPEN{FARMLAND}LEFT NOW,EXCEPT IN THE MORE ESTABLISHED AREA NORTH OF {WINNERSH.
